Task.UserRequest: Initialize GRACE Canonical Artifacts and Governance Structure
Task.PrimaryGoal: Establish the source of truth artifacts (Requirements, Technology, DevelopmentPlan) for the existing codebase.

Artifacts.TechnologyUpdates: Create baseline file with default decisions (PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, etc.)
Artifacts.DevelopmentPlanUpdates: Create baseline file listing existing services and modules

Decisions.Item: Record all existing technology choices as DEC-*
Define default stack decisions (Java/Spring version, DB, etc.)

AcceptanceCriteria.Item: RequirementsAnalysis.xml, Technology.xml, and DevelopmentPlan.xml exist in docs/grace/
Technology.xml contains DEC-* entries for all major stack components
DevelopmentPlan.xml lists all current maven modules as DP-SVC-* or libraries
